title: Government food purchases count toward GDP

content.prompt: Which of the following transactions would represent an addition to a nation's current gross domestic product?

choices.label: Ms. Smith purchases a share of stock in an automobile company.
A retailer increases her stock of imported shoes.
The government increases its domestic purchases of food for use by the military.
A corporation sells shoes from last year's inventory.
A mother sells her car to her daughter.
